select * from (select rownum rn, a.m_id, a.m_name, a.m_empnum, a.m_birth, a.m_phone, a.m_email, d.dpt_name, p.pt_name from (select * from member where m_status IN (1) order by m_name) a, position p, department d where a.dpt_code = d.dpt_code and a.pt_code = p.pt_code) where rn >= #{start} and rn <= #{end}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET pt_code = #{pt_code} WHERE m_id = #{m_id}
UPDATE member SET m_password = #{m_password} where m_id = #{m_id}
mapper.select: SELECT m.dpt_code ,(select dpt_name from department where 1=1 and dpt_code = m.dpt_code) as dpt_name ,COUNT(dpt_code) AS dpt_count from member m where 1=1 and dpt_code is not null GROUP BY m.dpt_code

select substr(tm_sdate,1,10) date_cnt, count(*) cnt from time where tm_type = 2 and substr(tm_sdate,1,10) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1,'YYYY-MM-DD') or substr(tm_sdate,1,10) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-2,'YYYY-MM-DD') or substr(tm_sdate,1,10) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-3,'YYYY-MM-DD') or substr(tm_sdate,1,10) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-4,'YYYY-MM-DD') or substr(tm_sdate,1,10) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-5,'YYYY-MM-DD') or substr(tm_sdate,1,10) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-6,'YYYY-MM-DD') or substr(tm_sdate,1,10) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-7,'YYYY-MM-DD') group by substr(tm_sdate,1,10) order by date_cnt
